content: As an AI language model, I cannot determine the motivations of game developers or generalize an entire industry. However, it is important to note that change can be a slow and challenging process, and that not all developers are equally committed to creating more diverse and inclusive games. Some game developers may face internal or external pressures that restrict their ability to make significant changes to their games' characters and narratives. Additionally, the demographic of players is diverse, and interests and expectations about video games can differ. This can make it challenging for developers to navigate the complexity surrounding the representation of gender in games. However, there are encouraging signs of progress, such as the creation of movements like #MeToo and #TimesUp that have raised awareness about gender representation in media generally, including video games. This increase in awareness may prompt game developers to prioritize these issues more in the future.
